code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec min_sum(nums1 :: [integer], nums2 :: [integer]) :: integer
  def min_sum(nums1, nums2) do
    sum1 = Enum.sum(nums1)
    sum2 = Enum.sum(nums2)
    zeros1 = Enum.count(nums1, &(&1 == 0))
    zeros2 = Enum.count(nums2, &(&1 == 0))

    if sum1 > sum2 and zeros2 == 0 or sum2 > sum1 and zeros1 == 0 do
      -1
    else
      delta = abs(sum1 - sum2)
      zeros = max(zeros1, zeros2)
      if delta == 0 do
        sum1 + zeros
      else
        if zeros1 >= zeros2 do
          if rem(delta, zeros2) == 0 do
            max(sum1, sum2) + delta + (zeros - zeros2)
          else
            -1
          end
        else
          if rem(delta, zeros1) == 0 do
            max(sum1, sum2) + delta + (zeros - zeros1)
          else
            -1
          end
        end
      end
    end
  end
end
